attributes.action: stop drunks and sports injuries getting free treatment on the NHS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Weekend drunks getting into fights and footballers e.t.c. getting free treatment at A& E at our hospitals.
Drunks getting into fights should be charged for treatment. No pay, no treatment. Pay up front.
Sports injuries should be also paid by the  person concerned. They can get insurance for this.
Stop waisting our money on these people. The NHS should not have to help these people who's injuries are self inflicted.
